description:
As the We Exhibit draws near, Maon-chan decides she wants to try a story recital instead of whistling. She decides to go home to try it in front of a small audience at her family`s inn first.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Christmas Eve Story, So Yeah
Seiya no Monogatari na no de
聖夜のものがたり♪ なので
